title: Aboard the Autumn Gold
setting: Far trader Autumn Gold, in jump space
atmosphere: Professional merchant vessel. Clean, efficient, crew knows their jobs. Climate controls gradually adjust during jump to match destination.
description: The Travellers spend a week in jump aboard Captain Corelli's far trader. Time for rest, preparation, and getting to know the ship and crew.
objectives: Learn about the route to Walston

key_dialogue.corelli_welcome: Welcome aboard the Autumn Gold. I'm Captain Corelli. Your passage is paid through to Walston. We'll be making a brief stop at 567-908 for cargo and refueling.
key_dialogue.route_info: It's a week in jump to the waystation, a day layover, then another week to Walston. Climate controls will adjust during transit - Walston runs cooler than Flammarion.
key_dialogue.cargo_question: I don't discuss cargo specifics. That's basic security. Suffice to say we're making scheduled deliveries.

persuade_8+: Discrete naval cargo bound for Elixabeth
Cargo includes officer uniforms and wine

narrator_prompt: A week in jump is time to prepare - mentally and physically. The Autumn Gold is a working ship, not a cruise liner. Captain Corelli runs a professional operation. The climate slowly shifts from warm Flammarion to cooler Walston conditions.
